syllabus_leaves.path: The Brihadeshwara temple > The temple has a portrait of Rajaraja Chola paying obeisance to Lord Nataraja.
path_titles: The temple has a portrait of Rajaraja Chola paying obeisance to Lord Nataraja.
syllabus_leaves.title: The temple has a portrait of Rajaraja Chola paying obeisance to Lord Nataraja.

syllabus_leaves.path: The Brihadeshwara temple > Inscriptions in the temple point towards Rajaraja as the chief architect of the temple.
path_titles: Inscriptions in the temple point towards Rajaraja as the chief architect of the temple.
syllabus_leaves.title: Inscriptions in the temple point towards Rajaraja as the chief architect of the temple.

syllabus_leaves.path: The Brihadeshwara temple > Depictions of dancers showing eighty one of hundred and eight karanas
path_titles: Depictions of dancers showing eighty one of hundred and eight karanas
syllabus_leaves.title: Depictions of dancers showing eighty one of hundred and eight karanas

syllabus_leaves.path: The Brihadeshwara temple > The inscriptions mention the different kinds of jewels used in the Chola period.
path_titles: The inscriptions mention the different kinds of jewels used in the Chola period.
syllabus_leaves.title: The inscriptions mention the different kinds of jewels used in the Chola period.

syllabus_leaves.path: The Brihadeshwara temple > It is one of the few temples that have Ashta-dikpaalakas
path_titles: It is one of the few temples that have Ashta-dikpaalakas
syllabus_leaves.title: It is one of the few temples that have Ashta-dikpaalakas
